creditline: Gift of Mrs. George P. Douglas, 1946
inscription:
In pencil:  The Seal Pool Fairmont Park Destroyed to (make?) an Art Gallery
Etched in plate at L.L.:  Designed to make a pond
markings: Collector's D stamp printed on verso; no watermark
signed:
In pencil in lower right margin:  Jo Pennell Imp; 
Etched among rocks at lower right:  Jo Pennell
title: The Seal Pool, Fairmont Park
